Description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain, which must be TV.

Clinical encounter number. Numeric version of VISIT can be used for
sorting.

Protocol-defined description of the clinical encounter. May be used in
addition to VISITNUM and/or VISITDY as a text description of the
clinical encounter.

Planned study day of VISIT. Due to its sequential nature, can be used
for sorting.

ARMCD is limited to 20 characters and does not have special character
restrictions. If the timing of visits for a trial does not depend on which
ARM a subject is in, then ARMCD should be null.
Name given to Arm or treatment group.

Rule describing when the visit starts, in relation to the sequence of
Elements.

Rule describing when the visit ends, in relation to the sequence of
Elements.
